title: Flagged as AFK: Because latest update wont let me move of the portal. ??????????
body: This is absolute bullshit to be punished for something out of my control what a joke. ????????????

replies.body: I want retribution on this issue. since ive spent atleast $800 on skins i think a refund or $200 in rp worth of skins would be appropriate for the amount of time i have had to endure down time and uptime with the game not working propally. Otherwise im going to complain to consumer affairs that the contract of this game is racketeering.

You're playing a glitchy video-game that glitches so much that it's unplayable to you. What to do about it?

Spend over $800 on it when you didn't have to spend a cent.
7 YEARS OF PROBLEM AFTER PROBLEM AND NOW A FLAGGING SYSTEM THAT KICKS YOU FOR THESE GLITCH BUGS. WHAT NEXT?
